segments.source_content:
---
title: Triaging GitHub Issues
---

translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: Start out by looking at issues that need triage, as identified by the ["Needs: Triage" label](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3A%22Needs%3A+Triage+%3Amag%3A%22).

translations.zh-hant: 首先查看標記為["Needs: Triage"標籤](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues?q=is%3Aissue+is%3Aopen+label%3A%22Needs%3A+Triage+%3Amag%3A%22)的待分類問題。

segments.source_content:
- Is this a request for code-level help with an individual app? Would this be a better fit for Stack Overflow? If so, apply the "Resolution: For Stack Overflow" label.
- Does this issue make appropriate use of the template? If not, apply the "Needs: Template" label.
- Does this issue mention the React Native version that was used? If not, apply the "Needs: Environment Info" label.
- Does this issue include a Snack, a code example, OR a list of steps to reproduce the issue? If not, apply the "Needs: Repro" label.

translations.zh-hant:
- 這是否為針對個別應用程式的程式碼層級求助？是否更適合發佈在Stack Overflow？如果是，請加上「Resolution: For Stack Overflow」標籤。
- 此問題是否正確使用了問題模板？若否，請加上「Needs: Template」標籤。
- 此問題是否提及使用的React Native版本？若否，請加上「Needs: Environment Info」標籤。
- 此問題是否包含Snack連結、程式碼範例或重現問題的步驟清單？若否，請加上「Needs: Repro」標籤。

segments.source_content:
:::note
We sometimes get issues that are quite not appropriate for the GitHub issue tracker. Add the "Type: Invalid" label, and a bot will close the issue automatically.
:::

translations.zh-hant:
:::note
我們偶爾會收到不適合GitHub問題追蹤系統的內容。請加上「Type: Invalid」標籤，機器人會自動關閉該問題。
:::

segments.source_content: Once you get to this point, you can transition to parsing the content of the issue itself. Does this issue include a **clear description** of the problem?

translations.zh-hant: 完成上述步驟後，即可開始審視問題內容本身。此問題是否包含對問題的**清晰描述**？

segments.source_content: If not, _politely_ ask the issue author to update their issue with the necessary information, and apply a "Needs: Author Feedback" label.

translations.zh-hant: If not, _politely_ ask the issue author to update their issue with the necessary information, and apply a "Needs: Author Feedback" label.

segments.source_content: We aim to always be friendly and helpful and expect the same from every member of our community.

translations.zh-hant: 我們始終秉持友善互助的態度，並期待社群每位成員皆能如此。

segments.source_content: ## Improving an Issue

translations.zh-hant: ## 改進問題

segments.source_content: If the issue contains all the necessary information, take a moment to consider if the issue can still be improved in some way. Is the formatting alright? You may lightly edit the issue to improve readability as needed.

translations.zh-hant: 若問題已包含所有必要資訊，請思考是否仍有改進空間。格式是否正確？可視需要輕度編輯問題以提升可讀性。

segments.source_content: If the issue contains an unformatted block of code, surround it with three back ticks (```) to convert it into a markdown code block.

translations.zh-hant: 若問題包含未格式化的程式碼區塊，請用三個反引號（```）將其包圍以轉換為Markdown程式碼區塊。

segments.source_content: Are there any labels you can add to help categorize it better? If the issue only affects Android apps, you may add a "Platform: Android" label. Perhaps the issue only manifests itself when developing on Windows, in which case you might add the "Platform: Windows" label.

translations.zh-hant: 是否有適合的分類標籤可添加？若問題僅影響Android應用，可加上「Platform: Android」標籤；若僅在Windows開發時出現，則可加上「Platform: Windows」標籤。

segments.source_content: We have a long list of [labels](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues/labels), please take a look and see if anything might apply!

translations.zh-hant: 我們有完整的[標籤清單](https://github.com/facebook/react-native/issues/labels)，請參考並添加適用標籤！

segments.source_content: ## Handling Duplicates

translations.zh-hant: ## 處理重複問題

segments.source_content: As you work through these issues, you will start to get a better understanding of the type of problems that get reported. You may even start noticing the same issue gets reported.

translations.zh-hant: 隨著處理經驗累積，您將逐漸熟悉常見問題類型，甚至會發現相同問題被重複回報。

segments.source_content: In these cases, you can close the issue and add a comment that says "Duplicate of #issue". By following this convention, GitHub will automatically mark the issue as a duplicate.

translations.zh-hant: 此時可關閉重複問題並留言「Duplicate of #issue」。遵循此慣例後，GitHub會自動標記為重複問題。

segments.source_content: ## Assessing Impact

translations.zh-hant: ## 評估影響層級

segments.source_content: Next up, we need to determine how severe the issue is.

translations.zh-hant: 接下來需判斷問題嚴重程度。

segments.source_content: ### Is this a potential **release blocker**?

translations.zh-hant: ### 是否可能成為**版本發布阻斷因素**？

segments.source_content: These issues should be addressed within the next week or two, as they may prevent release coordinators from cutting a clean release candidate.

translations.zh-hant: 此類問題應在一兩週內處理，因其可能阻礙發布協調者產出乾淨的候選版本。

segments.source_content: Issues that might be labeled as such could be regressions that break one of our pre-commit tests. Avoid flagging an issue as a release blocker if it has been around for some time (if the issue is already present in one or more releases, it cannot be a RC blocker by definition).

translations.zh-hant: 適合此標籤的情況包括導致預提交測試失敗的退化問題。若問題已存在多個版本中（依定義不可能成為RC阻斷因素），則不應標記為發布阻斷。

segments.source_content: ### Does this cause the app to **crash**?

translations.zh-hant: ### 是否導致應用程式**崩潰**？

segments.source_content: These are issues that cause a React Native to crash unexpectedly. These may lead to a poor user experience if not caught early.

translations.zh-hant: 此類問題會造成React Native意外終止。若未及時修復可能導致不良用戶體驗。

segments.source_content: ### Is this a **bug**?

Describes something that is not working as expected. It'd be nice to get it fixed at some point, but it's not serious enough to block the release train. Even if the issue causes a crash, if there's a reasonable workaround available, it can be classified as a regular bug.

translations.zh-hant: 描述未預期行為的問題。雖需修復但不致阻礙發布流程。即使導致崩潰，若有合理解決方案仍可歸類為一般錯誤。

segments.source_content: ### Is this a **good first issue**?

translations.zh-hant: ### 是否為**新手友善問題**？

segments.source_content: These are issues that do not require a deep understanding and familiarity with the repo. GitHub will surface these issues to folks interested in becoming contributors. Keep in mind that issues labeled this way may not end up getting fixed right away.

translations.zh-hant: 這些問題不需要對代碼庫有深入的理解和熟悉度。GitHub 會將這些問題展示給有意成為貢獻者的人。請注意，標記為此類型的問題可能不會立即得到修復。
